Need a new ncbi_taxonomy.db?
cmd:  taxit new_database

Things that should be in this directory at run-time that aren't right now:
1. latest taxdmp.zip from NCBI Taxonomy (unzipped)
2. ncbi_taxonomy.db (sqlite database)
3. full_lineage file with contains every taxid and its path to root
# Example of full lineage
#################################################################################### 
1
1
2	131567	1
6	335928	356	28211	1224	2	131567	1
7	6	335928	356	28211	1224	2	131567	1
9	32199	543	91347	1236	1224	2	131567	1
10	135621	72274	1236	1224	2	131567	1
11	1707	85016	85006	2037	85003	1760	201174	2	131567	1
13	203488	203487	203486	68297	2	131567	1
14	13	203488	203487	203486	68297	2	131567	1
16	32011	206350	28216	1224	2	131567	1
17	16	32011	206350	28216	1224	2	131567	1
18	213423	69541	28221	68525	1224	2	131567	1
19	18	213423	69541	28221	68525	1224	2	131567	1
20	76892	204458	28211	1224	2	131567	1
21	20	76892	204458	28211	1224	2	131567	1
22	267890	135622	1236	1224	2	131567	1
